Work
I walk into the office. I see my computer sitting on the desk. I walk over to the desk and sit down. I turn on the computer. I begin to use the keys and  mouse on the mousepad to work on the computer.


[WALK] <home_office> (1.319)
[WALK] <computer> (1.417)
[FIND] <computer> (1.417)
[FIND] <chair> (1.356)
[SIT] <chair> (1.356)
[SWITCHON] <computer> (1.417)
[FIND] <keyboard> (1.415)
[TYPE] <keyboard> (1.415)
[FIND] <mouse> (1.413)
[GRAB] <mouse> (1.413)
